subject: Football
lead_paragraph: Denver running back C.J. Anderson’s 48-yard run in overtime at a snowy Sports Authority Field was the game winner, and the rookie quarterback Brock Osweiler shined in his duel with New England’s Tom Brady.
snippet: Denver running back C.J. Anderson’s 48-yard run in overtime at a snowy Sports Authority Field was the game winner, and the rookie quarterback Brock Osweiler shined in his duel with New England’s Tom Brady.
